alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Minnehaha; Turner (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 8:29PM MDT until August 10 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Minnehaha County in southeastern South Dakota... Northern Lincoln County in southeastern South Dakota... Northeastern Turner County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 929 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tea, or 11 miles east of Parker, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Sioux Falls, Harrisburg, and Tea around 935 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
